item.title: About me
item.author: Author
item.description: Who am I? I am Sebastiano Guzzone, aka Seby (Sebastiano is too long..), known by many as Lillo Barilotto, the bad but not too bad admin of many telegram groups dedicated to the “Politecnico di Torino”. Why this website?.. The truth is that today 2021-04-07 I didn’t feel like studying and I said to myself why not, let’s do it. WAIT THIS IS FALSE. Ok well… Today 2022-05-16 it’s been a week since I got the coronavirus… So I decided to update the old site with a practically identical one .
